entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
